Sr. Technical Recruiter Prime Now Technology Group

Are you a Senior Software Engineer or SW Engineering Leader looking for the next step in your career, one that provides a high level of responsibility, growth and allows you to express your ideas to help grow a business? If the answer is “YES” an opportunity at Amazon might be for you! The Amazon's Prime Now Technology Organization is growing at an extremely fast rate and is hiring for a number of positions. We are seeking innovative, results-oriented, and customer-centric team players with expert technical and analytical skills to help expand one of Amazon’s fast-growing organizations. If you are open to learning about these roles, feel free to reach out to me at and I would be excited to tell you more!.**** I only work on senior roles for our division of Amazon since our event is geared for senior SW Engineers.If you graduated within the last 6 months or are still in college, we invite you to directly apply for positions via this link: www.amazon.com/college.
Sr Technical Recruiter Digital Products (Fire Phone) Amazon.com Through TalentFusion RPO

Sr Technical Recruiter AmazonFresh Technology Group for Amazon.com Through TalentFusion RPOCurrent Role:Sr Technical Recruiter AmazonFresh Technology Group Amazon.comFormer role:Sr. Technical Recruiter Digital Products (Fire Phone) for Amazon.comI am a technical recruiter for the AmazonFresh Technology Organization at Amazon.com. We are working on cutting edge "Top-Secret" new initiatives like the Fire Phone  that will allow us to marketplace disturbance on a global level to our customers.I am looking for entrepreneurial, innovative individuals who thrive on solving tough problems. Amazon has developed significant online digital and mobile businesses across a number of platforms.You will have an enormous opportunity to impact the customer experience, design, architecture, and implementation of cutting edge products that will be used every day by people you know. No matter what the role, we're looking for people who are passionate about innovating on behalf of customers, demonstrate a high degree of product ownership, and want to have fun while they make history.We currently have openings for the following positions at all levels that I recruit for at Amazon:Sr. Software Development Engineers and ManagersIf this sounds exciting to you then id love to talk to you about being a part of the Amazon.com revolution............................................Specialties: Technology Searches - Individual Contributor and ExecutivesSoftware Engineers at all levelsSales and Marketing Searches - Individual Contributor and ExecutivesIf this sounds exciting to you then id love to talk to you about being a part of the Amazon.com revolution. You can reach me at -neilland@amazon.com............................................**** I only work on senior SW Engineering roles for our division of Amazon. If you graduated within the last 6 months or are still in college, we invite you to directly apply for positions via this link: www.amazon.com/college.
OneMama Non-Profit mission to bring prosperity and health to people all over the world by empowering

About OneMama - www.onemama.orgI founded OneMama as a nonprofit organization with a mission to bring prosperity and health to people all over the world by empowering women as caregivers, mothers, businesswomen and agents of change for their rural communities. A United Nations Delegate for Global Partners on behalf of OneMamahttp://onemama.org/onemama_videos.html#vidfavhttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zmNwLbQnX68&feature=youtu.beSummaryOneMama has developed a unique model for service - whose beneficiaries receive 100% of proceeds - that blends indigenous treatment with modern medicine and economic development creating self-sustaining communities within 5-10 years. Now in Yr 5, this project is specific to building the 3rd and final tier (the Community Center) of our OneMama Pilot Program so that its members and the community can become 100% self-sustainable by Yr 10.What is the issue, problem, or challenge?There are nearly 1.8 billion people in the world living under $1.25 per day because of poor economies & virtually no access to techniques, trades, education & the global marketplace. Learning how to achieve the dream for a brighter future is unheard of in communities where fighting for survival is the only outcome. OneMama seeks to eliminate these statistics by building 250 clinics around the world a starting with our pilot program in Uganda - which serves & empowers over 150 people per month!How will this project solve this problem?Your donation will directly benefit OneMama community members by providing birthing & medical supplies as well as training, materials & the development of their Community Center. We believe that in order to establish a self-sustaining community (just like any business), there must be nurturing & economic strategy. Now in Yr 5, we know that completing the Community Center will take Kirindi Village to 100% self-sustainability by Yr 10 - eliminating these poverty statistics one community at a time!Potential Long Term Impact
Sr Executive Search Technical & Securities Compliance Recruiter

Responsible for locating and attracting both active and passive core Executive level and technical talent at a high volume to fill positions quickly for fortune 1000 . Use Internet and telephone strategies to uncover all possible name generated leads and develop extensive network of contacts for use in recruiting, locating targeted candidates for every position.Siobhan's Recruiting and Research expertise includes: Passive & Active Pipeline Development, Recruiting ,Profiling and Candidate Development & with her a unique Research Methodology she created at SER.Her expertice is searching for titles such as Individual Contribtors in the technology space to Executive Level ,such as CCO, COO, CFO, CEO , R&D Eng ,QAE, SDET ,IT, Sales, Pre & Post Sales, Sales Management, Marketing, Tech Support, and Consultants, and as well as many other high profile and very technically oriented positions in most Corporate Industries
Sr Leadership & Executive Diversity Recruiter at VISA

Sr Leadership & Executive Diversity Recruiter at VISAPartnering with Executive and HR leadership to help build Innovative confidential and complex global teams at SVP/VP level for the President’s Technology Organization here at Visa. I love taking top tier companies to the next level , and here I am getting that opportunity.My focus is on client facing organization, client support services, global products and new solutions.Visa is a global payments technology company that connects consumers, businesses, financial institutions and governments in more than 200 countries and territories to fast, secure and reliable electronic payments. Underpinning electronic payments is one of the world’s most advanced processing networks—VisaNet—that is capable of handling more than 10,000 transactions a second, with fraud protection for consumers and guaranteed payment for merchants. Visa is not a bank, and does not issue cards, extend credit or set rates and fees for consumers. Visa’s innovations, however, enable its financial institution customers to offer consumers more choices: pay now with debit, ahead of time with prepaid or later with credit products. For more information, visit www.corporate.visa.com.Interested in joining/learning more about senior leadership roles at Visa? Drop me a note (sneillan@visa.com).EVERYONE KNOWS VISA. FEW GET TO SHAPE IT.
Life Changing to be walk hand and hand with others to empower each other

OneMama - Siobhan Neilland
Founder, OneMama-Non-Profit mission to bring prosperity and health to people all over the world by empowering women
April 23, 2008, OneMama - Siobhan worked with Siobhan but at different companies

""Siobhan Neilland is the founder of both OneMama and SER Consulting - She Is utilizing her consulting ability to build an organization that will bring more heart into her daily life by empowering woman around the globe. Siobhan & OneMama’s mission begins with a pilot program in Uganda. This program provides a medical clinic and supplies, along with onsite health and financial education for midwives and their clients. Clinic participants learn about family planning, pre and postnatal care, and economic sustainability. The participants, whether they are mothers, fathers, midwives, or volunteers must contribute back to OneMama, creating a unified support system. We will eventually replicate this program in different communities around the globe.""

M. Nicole Rodzen
Marketing Consultant & Brand Strategist
December 22, 2013, Siobhan was a client of M. Nicole’s

"What would we do without a “Nicole” as part of our team? Nicole has been an instrumental part of developing and improving not only the product strategies and operational implementation of processes for OneMama.org and ShaBoom Products, but has been a dedicated team member leading the organization to elevated and improved business strategies – something that has no textbook definition of developing a lean enterprise from the ground up. Needless to say, she has been a leader in this organization in successfully doing so. Our team recently awarded Nicole as being the July 2013 Action Hero for her work as the Consulting Program Director of The OneMama Foundation & ShaBoom Products, with her other nicknamed titles as “Marketing Goddess” and “Renaissance Lady of Operations”. There aren’t any better words to state it. Nicole has dedicated time, energy, sweat, tears, and many sleepless nights to ensure The OneMama Foundation continues saving lives. If anyone is looking to take their business to another level, you’d have to have Nicole on your team. This woman is an ALL-STAR from product to market as well as a powerhouse in innovative business solutions. We love her to the moon and back.
